exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R_UniformSpace l : V H : is_RInt_gen f (at_point a) (at_point b) l Unable to unify "(?U * ?V)%type" with "let (sort, _, _) := NormedModule.ModuleSpace R_AbsRing V in sort".

In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R_UniformSpace l : V H : is_RInt_gen f (at_point a) (at_point b) l P : ?U -> Prop Unable to unify "exists eps : posreal, forall y : ?U, ball (fst l) eps y -> P y" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : V, ball l eps y -> P y".

In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R_UniformSpace l : V H : is_RInt_gen f (at_point a) (at_point b) l Unable to unify "is_RInt_gen f (at_point a) (at_point b) l" with "is_RInt f a b l".

In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R_UniformSpace l : V H : is_RInt_gen f (at_point a) (at_point b) l P : ?V -> Prop Unable to unify "exists eps : posreal, forall y : ?V, ball (snd l) eps y -> P y" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : V, ball l eps y -> P y".

In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R_UniformSpace l : V H : is_RInt_gen f (at_point a) (at_point b) l Unable to unify "is_RInt_gen f (at_point a) (at_point b) l" with "is_RInt f a b l".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R_UniformSpace l : V H : is_RInt f a b l Unable to unify "Prop" with "is_RInt_gen f (at_point a) (at_point b) l".

In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R_UniformSpace l : V H : is_RInt f a b l eps : V -> Prop The term "filterlim_locally_ball_norm ?f ?y0" has type "filterlim ?f ?F (locally ?y0) <-> (forall eps0 : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball_norm ?y0 eps0 (?f x)))" while it is expected to have type "is_filter_lim (locally ?x) ?y".

original: intros. split. - intros. apply is_RInt_fct_extend_pair with (a0 := a) (b0 := b). + apply is_RInt_fct_extend_fst with (l0 := l). apply H. + apply is_RInt_fct_extend_snd with (l0 := l). apply H. - intros. apply is_RInt_gen. unfold filterlimi. intros eps. apply (is_filter_lim_locally_unique _ _ (filterlim_locally_ball_norm _ _)). intros y Hy. exists (ball y eps). apply Hy.
